title: Toasting notifications on the new client do not clear.
body:
I'm aware of the support banner, but the same toasts keep appearing every time I log in.
This has occurred at least 5 times already.  Not sure how to fix this (or if it'll fix itself next patch?).

-LostFr0st

replies.body: Are these specific notifications or do they just keep piling up? Can you [**send me a screenshot**](https://gyazo.com/) so I can confirm these notifications are being served correctly?

https://uploads.disquscdn.com/images/32961a3ec473bd5cb288f5a1c34f087c231476a8ec269e0b8b529ed1756f87d8.jpg

Specifically the shad8whawk one.  I sent him one gift (snow day gnar) but the popup returns yet again.
The icon ones seem to have cleared once I clicked them only once though.

Edit: clicked each notification and allowed the animation to fully play through then relogged.  That seems to have cleared them.  Ty Targons Blade for trying to help.
